html:
The weather in Smallenske

PhotoVideo
  • All news tapes
  • News
  • Country and world
  • Society
  • Sport
  • Business
  • Subscription
  • Coronaurus

Smolenska and the field. Main developments in the city

1 minute ago
In the Smole region, the list of swimming places for Creation has changed.

It added places for bathing in the Safone district and changed the number of places in the Smolen and Gagarin regions. Previously, the regional MESP has published a list of points in which shrimp baths will take place between 18 and 19 January.

Today, 10:40
In Smolenske, the spouses were convicted of corruption at a medical facility.

On 11 and 16 January, a high-profile bribery case at AGM was opened. Both spouses were sentenced to real imprisonment. The woman was suspended because of a child under 14 years of age.

Today, 10:05
In Smallsk, an international tournament for the Basketball Lega of Friendship will take place
He'll open a sports competition, "You know what he was like!" about the 90th anniversary of Yuri Gagarin's birthday.
Today, 9:29
Pre-scheduled visits of children ' s doctors to the Smole region

This was reported in the Regional Ministry of Health. Children are examined by specialists on the basis of a predefined list.

Today, 08:45
Preparations for a new fire hazard season have begun in the Smolene region
The personnel are trained and specialists prepare a consolidated forest fire plan for 2024.
Today, 08:03
An accidental slaughterer gave 100,000 roubles to the perpetrator of the accident.

She was assisted by a court martial at the Safonovsky and Holm Zhirkov districts. It was ordered by the court to compensate for moral harm.

Today, 07:28
In Smallsk, Mihail Isakowski's birthday will celebrate the concert.
On 19 January, 125 years will elapse from the birth of our famous earthman, an honorary citizen of the town of Smolensk, a poet of M.V. Isakowski.
yesterday, 21:42
The weather in the Smole region is potentially dangerous
In the Smole region, a " yellow " level of weather hazard has been declared, as reported by the Rosgidromet Centre.
yesterday, 19:31
In Smolenska, illegal tobacco trade near school was prevented
Smolene The survey brought a complaint to the court against an individual entrepreneur engaged in illicit trade in tobacco products.
yesterday, 18:59
Senator Artem Malaženkov purchased a sewing machine for the Vash Tal67 molten volunteers
Such a request was made by the volunteers to the coordinator of the " One Russia " project, " Everything for the front " , before a new year ' s holiday.
Yesterday, 18:30.
In the Molene Poserier, they described how the new tourism route was being upgraded.
Last year, a project was launched at the " Molene Poserje " to set up a new route " Praguevalski around Lake Sapshaw " . At the National Park Administration, they told me how the creation of one of the longest trails was progressing.
Yesterday, 18:03
Slaughterers complained about water problems

They won the trial. The defendant has undertaken to meet a number of demands made by the Survey.

yesterday, 17:25
What roads have been repaired in the Smole region following complaints by residents
The repair of road sections where complaints were received was carried out as part of the national project " Safe Quality Roads " .
Yesterday, 16:45
Four moles won a million rubies in a new year's lottery.

On the first day of New Year, four new millionaires appeared in the region. The lucky ones came from Roslav, Gagarina and Smolensk. They told the lottery operator's press service about it.

yesterday, 16:21
An updated adult polyclinic atomers in Desnoirsk has been opened at MSF No. 135
After extensive renovation and repair, the patient ' s doors opened a loll of the adult health clinic No. 135 Desnoorsk. Now it's a comfort space with modern design and comfortable furniture, literate logic, visualization...
Yesterday, 16:07
In the Smole region, the fraudster decepted the buyer and owner of the car.

The salesman and client have come together in an unusual way. It was only when the satisfied buyer transferred the money for the mark. Turns out both men were talking... with a bug.

yesterday, 15:31
From the strong freezer to the back. In the Smole region, temperatures are expected to fall sharply
Today, our region predicts up to -23°C. But tomorrow, another cyclone will be on the Russian plain, the air temperature will rise sharply, the methle will begin.
yesterday, 14:53
Vladimir Putin denounced the extension of the comfort urban environment project
In the Smole region, 10 public spaces will benefit from 2024.
yesterday, 14:17
In the Smole region, criminal proceedings were initiated after the death of a 74-year-old pensioner in the accident.

The incident occurred on 13 December 2023 near the village of Sinkovo on 11 kilometres of the Smolensk-Vyazim-Zubtsovo road in the Smolen district. As a result of the accident, an elderly passenger died in the hospital.

yesterday, 13:42.
From Sambo to poetry. How will the Jury Gagarin Jubilee competition be?
The organization of the " One Russia " project discussed sports tours and competition in the Smole region. Details were also published for artists.
